content: Bootstrapping the compiler with MIR inlining enabled already helped to find a few bugs. I'd like to run crater to verify that we have found enough to consider merging the PR. What is the process to run crater? I will probably need to be at least "build". Running testsuites may even find some miscompilations.
Process? Just @craterbot if there's a good reason. https://github.com/rust-lang/crater/blob/master/docs/bot-usage.md
There's one other PR in the crater queue. https://crater.rust-lang.org/
I think it's as simple as doing a try build and then @craterbot test. I agree with running tests and not just building
You probably want a new try build first before starting crater
Thanks for the instructions. Queued a run.
